name: Be outside the box #01..
description:
If we stay inside the box, we won't be able to see the big picture..

It's predictable so it's comfortable. Well, I get that..

But if we are so comfortable and predictable, life would be so boring that we will lose sight of the point of living..

And that makes me sad.. I don't want to live like that.. I want to surprise people and also be surprised.. 

So I will leave this box, the box that this society has given me since my first day on this Earth.. I refuse to live in it.. I won't..

Visual image made through the study of Perlin Noise, Flow Field and Geometric Shapes.

//Made with processing through java library.

//1080*1080px
